thread.title: Blake Snell, partner Haeley & newborn son Kaedyn melt hearts in coordinated outfits for their first Christmas together in Chicago

title: Blake Snell, partner Haeley & newborn son Kaedyn melt hearts in coordinated outfits for their first Christmas together in Chicago

Blake Snell, partner Haeley & newborn son Kaedyn melt hearts in coordinated outfits for their first Christmas together in Chicago Discuss Now MLB: San Francisco Giants at Kansas City Royals - Source: Imagn Blake Snell will be a part of the LA Dodgers lineup starting in the 2025 season. This will be the third team in as many years for Snell, as he continues his tour through the National League West Division. He pitched for the San Diego Padres from 2021-23 before spending last season with the San Francisco Giants .
Meanwhile, Snell and his partner, Haeley, welcomed their son, Kaedyn, in May. The trio was seen spending their first Christmas together in Chicago, according to Snell's Instagram post, where he was holding Kaedyn and sitting beside Haeley, all of them in matching pajamas.
"Merry Christmas ðŸŽ„," Snell captioned the post. â€¢
70% Win (110-25-1) 70% Win (110-25-1) 70% Win (110-25-1) Unlock Free tips from our Experts Get Picks Now Blake Snell's Family Snell has plenty of financial support for his family, as his contract came with a $52 million signing bonus. The Dodgers are on the hook for the next five seasons with Snell, and he will make more than $180 million. Last season did not go well for Snell with the San Francisco Giants, but the Dodgers are hopeful that he can return to Cy Young form.
